body: I marked this as a duplicate of #1435 and I tagged #1435 for consideration in Go 1.7. The runtime package is certainly the wrong place for this API. Perhaps the os package, but even there I worry that it's too customized for Linux. The right fix really is to make syscall.Setuid/syscall.Setgid behave as one would expect. The discussion on #1435 explains why this is difficult, but it's still the right fix.
